aaanalysis.load_scales

aaanalysis.load_scales(name='scales', just_aaindex=False, unclassified_in=True)[source]

Load amino acid scales, scale classification (AAontology), or scale evaluation.

A thorough analysis of the residue and sequence datasets can be found in .

Parameters:

  • name (str, default = 'scales') – Name of the dataset to load. Options are ‘scales’, ‘scales_raw’, ‘scales_cat’, ‘scales_pc’, ‘top60’, and ‘top60_eval’.

  • unclassified_in (bool, optional) – Whether unclassified scales should be included. The ‘Others’ category counts as unclassified. Only relevant if name is ‘scales’, ‘scales_raw’, or ‘scales_cat’.

  • just_aaindex (bool, optional) – Whether only scales provided from AAindex should be given. Only relevant if name is ‘scales’, ‘scales_raw’, or ‘scales_cat’.

Returns:

Dataframe for the selected scale dataset.

Return type:

DataFrame
